title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction; Concepts of hydrodynamics and water wave theory; environmental loads on offshore structures; Concepts of fluid structure interaction, wave statistics and probabilistic design of offshore structures; Analysis and design of fixed platform, floating platform and mooring systems
